divs: Sighting Detailsin back seet of of car while parents were in front not paying attention to child. me in back seet. i watched as it flew over head. it spun a couple of time while maintaining a straight course. it was amazeing. not saying it was alien. just saying like always our government is hideing important technology from its people. i was in craryvill ny columbia county when it happened. i was watching the skies when it happened. it was so close thats what made me notice it.the craft its self was black. i was happy at the time because it made me relize i wasnt alone. but to day i relize its just our government hideing secrets such as technology we as a people could use for good.
Summary: triangle mabe 500 yards directly above six white lights 2 lights on each side of vessel. flew with zero sound.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Copake Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
